course_title: Social Cultural & Health Issues Related to Female Incarceration
course_description: Students explore a variety of disciplinary perspectives related to incarceration and address the societal, cultural and health issues incarcerated women encounter. Students will reflect on their own values and perceptions of incarceration.
sections: Class Nbr: 3294, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: F 1-2:50p, Instructor: B. Baker, Status: Open
